update RBAC_USER
ID_USAP = #{idUsap,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUM_MOB = #{numMob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXT_EML = #{txtEml,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NOTES = #{idNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_STAFF = #{idStaff,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAM_USER = #{namUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COD_USER_SEX = #{codUserSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COD_USER_STATE = #{codUserState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VLU_USER_PWD = #{vluUserPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VLU_USER_SEQ = #{vluUserSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COD_USER_TYPE = #{codUserType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_ORG = #{idOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAM_ORG = #{namOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CRTOR = #{idCrtor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAM_CRTOR = #{namCrtor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME_CRT = #{timeCrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CNT_LGIN_FAIL = #{cntLginFail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TIME_LAST_LGIN_FAIL = #{timeLastLginFail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME_LAST_MDF_PWD = #{timeLastMdfPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXT_HIST_PWD_LST = #{txtHistPwdLst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUM_PHO_1 = #{numPho1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUM_PHO_2 = #{numPho2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXT_USER_DSCR = #{txtUserDscr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_TELLER = #{idTeller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PWD_SALT = #{pwdSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID_USER = #{idUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
